EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering your interest in Google Cloud Platform due diligence information through KY3P® by IHS Markit.
KY3P® Assessment Services offers a range of information options to our customers, including:
Vendor self-attested due diligence question responses. KY3P® by IHS Markit assessment reports – these are structured around a blended framework of over 100 control objectives across numerous risk domains. Reports are offered in varying tiers, dependent upon the particular risk driven needs of a user, and contain data from multiple sources, including third party security providers, with observations included from a market leading audit firm.
The following due diligence options are available via KY3P for Google Cloud Platform:
Option What’s Covered Price (USD) Google Cloud Platform self-attested responses to the KY3P Due Diligence Questionnaire (DDQ) Access to view the Google Cloud Platform responses through the KY3P platform Free Express Assessment Assessment report leveraging vendor’s publicly facing information and outside in data sources to provide a view of vendor risk. 750 Remote Desktop Assessment Assessment conducted by remote vendor interview, including review of vendor provided documentation, clarifications and outside in data sources to provide a view of vendor risk. 2500 Enhanced Desktop Assessment Assessment conducted onsite at a vendor to provide maximum coverage over due diligence requirements. N.B. Due to the Covid-19 pandemic onsite visits have been replaced with remote screen sharing sessions. 5500
To request access to the DDQ or request to purchase an assessment for Google Cloud Platform, please contact Ky3psupport@ihsmarkit.com. Delivery will be made back to the referred email address, which may take up to 15 business days dependent upon the information requested.
If you are interested in hearing more about the solutions KY3P can provide, we would be happy to arrange a call with our specialists.
If you have any questions please reach out to us at the contact details below.
KY3P Hotline US: + 1 844 210 KY3P (5937) KY3P UK: + 44 207 113 KY3P (5937) Email: ky3psupport@ihsmarkit.com.
We look forward to working with you.
Best Regards,
KY3P Customer Services Team
